item.title: Are Privacy Laws a Joke About Privacy?
item.description: You dont read Terms and Conditions of services you use Let’s face the reality, you can’t read 20 min of Terms and Conditions in 2 seconds every website or services you visit Have you actually, once in your life, seriously read one with all the attention it deserves to fully understand at which extent your privacy is at stake? I did it couple of times before I realized how vain effort it was.

item.title: How I built this privacy friendly blog
item.description: Why I built this blog Social Media dominant ideology is corrupting people thoughts In an increasingly manicheist world loosing its sense of shades and scales of Tolerance towards extremes sides, I found difficult to publicly express my view of facts and events that may contradicts dominant ideology. I was looking for a way to post my opinions and thoughts online while avoiding the new norm of social media pressure that systematically judges you according to some political prism or psychological bias.
